EIP.description: Java Integration Framework implementing the Enterprise Integration Patterns, doing the mediation and routing of the messages using a DSL Language (Java, Spring XML or Blueprint XML). This core module contains the logic to support the different patterns, many languages (Simple, constant, header, body) to manipulate the content & expressions to take decisions during the routing.

Documentation.description: AsciidoctorJ is the official library for running Asciidoctor on the JVM. Using AsciidoctorJ, you can convert AsciiDoc content or analyze the structure of a parsed AsciiDoc document from Java and other JVM languages.
